directions.step:
Cook 1 pack (9 oz) frozen artichoke hearts until soft following pack
directions. Drain. Combine 2 oz Neufchatel cheese, 1/2 small chopped onion, 2 tsp. lemon juice, 1/8 tsp. liquid red pepperseasoning & drained artichoke hearts in food processor. Whirl until smooth & blended.
File ftp://ftp.idiscover.co.uk/pub/food/mealmaster/recipes/mmkah001.zip
